physical_appearance:\The image shows a set of 2 identical promotional posters. Both are rectangular in shape. Their backgrounds are predominantly white. There is a red line that is drawn horizontally across both posters at their mid-points. The image of a food cart with a sign bearing the words \\Penang Laksa\\ is drawn. Multiple images of humans and animals are drawn as well. \

metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a set of 2 identical promotional posters. Both are rectangular in shape. Their backgrounds are predominantly white. There is a red line that is drawn horizontally across both posters at their mid-points. The image of a food cart with a sign bearing the words ""Penang Laksa"" is drawn. metadata.subject_terms_2: Promotional materials Posters Business enterprises Drawing
metadata.sgcool_label_text:
fFurious was formed in 1999 by Little Ong and his friends. It is now a multi-disciplinary creative communications company with clients that include advertising agencies, publishing companies, small businesses to MNCs, non-profit organisations and government bodies.
Besides offering services in graphic/motion/interactive design, illustration and photography, fFurious also has non-commercial pursuits in the form of exhibitions and the development of personal art projects that has included short films, and even a comic series.
